title: Mathieu van der Poel Reboots for World Title Showdown with Pogačar, Evenepoel: ‘It Will Be Difficult, but He Has a Chance’
content:
MVDP to hunt for mountain legs with program of low-key stage races, Euro champs ahead of underdog world title defense in Zurich.
